title: BOOKSTORE / BACK DOOR
description: It's the back door of "Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People". You can look at it, use a key object on it or try to force it open.

dialogueTree.title: Warded Door: "A heavy door with a missing handle..."
dialogueTree.text: A heavy door with a missing handle stands before you, covered in dozens (if not hundreds) of Semenese trinkets and charms. It appears to be locked.

links.title: You: "Maybe I *should* break it down? But..."
links.text: Maybe I *should* break it down? But not before I strategize...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's right, take in your surround..."
links.text: That's right, take in your surroundings. You need to have a solid ground and a proper posture if you want to succeed.

links.title: You: "First -- check your posture."
links.text: First -- check your posture.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Steady breathing, solid core -- you..."
links.text: Steady breathing, solid core -- you've got this. With one shoulder forward you're ready to smash into the door like a battering ram.

links.title: You: "Check your surroundings."
links.text: Check your surroundings.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The room is dimly lit and littered..."
links.text: The room is dimly lit and littered with old barber shop rubbish, but the path to the door is clear.

links.title: You: "And what about the door?"
links.text: And what about the door?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's made of a solid block of wood,..."
links.text: It's made of a solid block of wood, but it has stood there for ages -- the hinges are old and coated with a carmine layer of rust. It should be doable.

links.title: You: "Knock on the door."
links.text: Knock on the door.

links.title: Warded Door: "Only an echo... No one is there."
links.text: Only an echo... No one is there.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "A hollowed out, dark echo..."
links.text: A hollowed out, dark echo...

links.title: You: "Unlock the door with the key."
links.text: Unlock the door with the key.

links.title: Warded Door: "After exerting some force you manag..."
links.text: After exerting some force you manage to turn the key. It's eerily silent. The door slides slightly open, letting a draft of cold air into the room.

links.title: Shivers: "You feel the tiny hairs on the back..."
links.text: You feel the tiny hairs on the back of your neck rise up, as if someone's standing right behind you.

links.title: Half Light: "An uneasy knot forms in the pit of..."
links.text: An uneasy knot forms in the pit of your stomach...

links.title: You: "Touch the back of your neck: What i..."
links.text: Touch the back of your neck: What is this feeling?

links.title: Shivers: "Outside, the wind howls in from acr..."
links.text: Outside, the wind howls in from across the bay. The building at Rue de Saint-Ghislaine stands like a matchbox on its side, with men inside like little wooden sticks ready to catch fire.

links.title: Shivers: "A panicking woman squeezes the pend..."
links.text: A panicking woman squeezes the pendant around her neck until it leaves a mark inside her palm. A man, a few metres away, stands frozen with a key in his hand. Somewhere inside a spider is spinning its web.

links.title: You: ""Uh, Kim? Maybe you should go first..."
links.text: "Uh, Kim? Maybe you should go first..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, you're the one in charg..."
links.text: "Detective, you're the one in charge." The lieutenant motions toward the door.

links.title: You: "[Open the door and enter.]"
links.text: [Open the door and enter.]

links.title: You: "Break down the door."
links.text: Break down the door.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You smash into the wood and see a s..."
links.text: You smash into the wood and see a small crack appear on the door frame. It's going to take one more try to break through to the other side, but you've done it...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're not thinking of trying agai..."
links.text: "You're not thinking of trying again, are you?" The lieutenant stares at you as you stand there, silent and brooding.

links.title: You: "Smash into the door again -- wordle..."
links.text: Smash into the door again -- wordless.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The door shudders with your impact...."
links.text: The door shudders with your impact. Hinges snap, panels crack, splinters fly by as you smash through, tumbling into the darkness ahead.

links.title: You: "Smash into the door and shout: "Wel..."
links.text: Smash into the door and shout: "Welcome to Revachol!"

links.title: You: "Smash into the door and shout: "Fuc..."
links.text: Smash into the door and shout: "Fuck the system!"

links.title: You: "Smash into the door and shout: "Fre..."
links.text: Smash into the door and shout: "Freeze, dirtbags!"

links.title: You: "Smash into the door and shout: "Han..."
links.text: Smash into the door and shout: "Hands up, now!"

links.title: You: "Smash into the door and shout: "Fuc..."
links.text: Smash into the door and shout: "Fuck, it hurts!"

links.title: Plaisance: ""What are you doing, officer?!" A v..."
links.text: "What are you doing, officer?!" A voice rings from the other room. It sounds almost worried -- worried about your health.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ow, shoot! Whose moronic idea was i..."
links.text: Ow, shoot! Whose moronic idea was it to just *run through the door*? Don't you know that things like that *hurt*?!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Walk it off, son! Stop wriggling li..."
links.text: Walk it off, son! Stop wriggling like a maggot, it's nothing to worry about.

links.title: You: ""Oh god..." (Try to breathe normall..."
links.text: "Oh god..." (Try to breathe normally.) "This really wasn't the best idea, was it..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you alright?" The lieutenant s..."
links.text: "Are you alright?" The lieutenant steps closer, his eyes soft and worried. "This looked... pretty intense and painful, I must admit."

links.title: Plaisance: ""What is going *on* there?!" an ups..."
links.text: "What is going *on* there?!" an upset, high-pitched voice calls out from the bookstore. "Are you really trying to break down the back door?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""I warn you, don't tempt the spirit..."
links.text: "I warn you, don't tempt the spirits, officer!" You can hear her take a frightened step backwards. "Don't tempt the spirits or you'll damage the holy *wards* on the door!"

links.title: Warded Door: "It barely looks like you've done an..."
links.text: It barely looks like you've done any damage to the door, however -- it's still locked and closed, covered in dozens of little charms and trinkets.

links.title: You: ""I deserve this. My body deserves t..."
links.text: "I deserve this. My body deserves to suffer for being this *weak* and *disappointing*."

links.title: You: ""Is that... Is that *blood* I'm see..."
links.text: "Is that... Is that *blood* I'm seeing?" (Rub your forehead.)

links.title: You: ""Please don't cry, please don't cry..."
links.text: "Please don't cry, please don't cry..." (Slap your face.) "I don't want anyone to see me cry!"

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Physical Instrument: "What if... you just break it down?"
links.text: What if... you just break it down?

dialogueTree.title: Warded Door: "A heavy door with a missing handle..."
dialogueTree.text: A heavy door with a missing handle stands before you, covered in dozens (if not hundreds) of little oddly-shaped trinkets and charms. It appears to be locked.
